ai-tika-abh06t68:4_0: (There is) a mind that is bodily form, Emancipation and Emancipation
ai-tika-abh06t68:5_0: Therefore now the wind is spoken to be spoken of, just as the wind is spoken.
ai-tika-abh06t68:7_0: This is what is known as reasonable, to cause the reason why it is known.
ai-tika-abh06t68:8_0: there is two kinds of clear vision: there is what is designated as if there is.
ai-tika-abh06t68:10_0: As to the seventh pairs of mangoes,
ai-tika-abh06t68:11_0: the dwelling place of the Virūpakkhas,
ai-tika-abh06t68:13_0: Likewise in the case of the Sakyans that are uncorrupted in this way.
ai-tika-abh06t68:14_0: Wisdom is wisdom, not being mindful, he is mindful,
ai-tika-abh06t68:16_0: The ultimate, the ultimate one, and the defining of these two.
ai-tika-abh06t68:17_0: Herein, the ultimate meaning has the ultimate characteristics.
ai-tika-abh06t68:19_0: Endowed on the Truths about the characteristics of truth
ai-tika-abh06t68:20_0: The place where it is beneficial, the footprints of the nose,
ai-tika-abh06t68:22_0: Therefore if she has been designated, (surely) declaringing the meaning.
ai-tika-abh06t68:23_0: Shackles for all advocates that exist in every way;
ai-tika-abh06t68:25_0: Just as that is ultimate goal-nortance and so on,
ai-tika-abh06t68:26_0: and wisdom are prepared by women and so on,
ai-tika-abh06t68:29_0: With one who is possessed, she is known as due to those names.
ai-tika-abh06t68:31_0: the designation of the wisdom, and because of what is reckoned as a particular.
ai-tika-abh06t68:32_0: Describing the four classes of rebirth:
ai-tika-abh06t68:35_0: but crasping curs in the letter.
ai-tika-abh06t68:38_0: All things are designated as deportment.
ai-tika-abh06t68:40_0: Herein, there are two kinds of teachers:
ai-tika-abh06t68:41_0: Declaring the meaning of the type of lights,
ai-tika-abh06t68:43_0: Describing the designation of the designations, etc.
ai-tika-abh06t68:44_0: Description of the paths is known as poscribing.
ai-tika-abh06t68:46_0: Since ‘Whoever has nothing,’ in what way have I not done,
ai-tika-abh06t68:47_0: Is heedlessly described the meaning of what is good.
ai-tika-abh06t68:50_0: Declaring the designation of the depths,
ai-tika-abh06t68:52_0: This is said in the Commentary on the eighth day.
ai-tika-abh06t68:53_0: After taking note of this there is two kinds of people:
ai-tika-abh06t68:55_0: for this has the ultimate characteristics,
ai-tika-abh06t68:56_0: having designated the meaning and the designation of meaning,
ai-tika-abh06t68:58_0: In name and clan are designated as ‘perfected’.
ai-tika-abh06t68:59_0: (They are) compared to the path, which have three ways:
ai-tika-abh06t68:62_0: Endowed with the truths, for those who don’t like that.
ai-tika-abh06t68:64_0: is the designation of the truths, (which is) as they are.
ai-tika-abh06t68:65_0: knowing the limit of the worldly conditions, having attained declaration,
ai-tika-abh06t68:67_0: Thus you said to the Enlightenment Tree
ai-tika-abh06t68:68_0: Therefore it should be understood to secret,
ai-tika-abh06t68:69_0: The exposition of the teaching is finished.
